artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Published by Fujiokaya Hikotarō
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
poem(kyo_ku):Either you drink or not, hundreds of people gathering at Ogura-an by O_gimatsu(or O_sho_)
Japanese:Geko jo_go hyakunin mo tsudou Ogura-an, O_gimatsu
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Ogura-an at Koume in Honjo
